title: Honor level bar
body: i played more games than my friends, every game he played i was there, and we vote each other, but i always got more votes from other players. Why he reach level 3 first? Is there a bar here or just level up  randomly

replies.body: There isn't currently an honor exp bar, mostly because they didn't want Honor to feel like a grind that you needed to do. If he was able to rank up quicker, he was either honored more often or played more games without you.
hi for sureï¼Œsince there is an honor system i play games everyday, and get honor every games. could u check my account there must be something wrong.
I've started to see a decent amount of players start hitting Honor Rank 3 in the past week or so. You're probably right around the corner from ranking up!
